body_html:
Hi @kshitij12345 , really looking forward and appreciated for your implementation!

The double backward operator is becoming more and more important recently such as the usage in recent NAS work . To support double backward for Embedding is significantly desirable for NLP related tasks that are built upon these latest research.
body_text:
Hi @kshitij12345 , really looking forward and appreciated for your implementation!
The double backward operator is becoming more and more important recently such as the usage in recent NAS work . To support double backward for Embedding is significantly desirable for NLP related tasks that are built upon these latest research.
body:
Hi @kshitij12345 , really looking forward and appreciated for your implementation! 

The double backward operator is becoming more and more important recently such as the usage in recent [NAS work](https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.09055) . To support double backward for Embedding is significantly desirable for NLP related tasks that are built upon these latest research.
